name: Raiders of the Lost Bark
description:
A mini survival adventure about befriending Corgis and going on a mysterious treasure hunt with them! 

  • Explore a desert full of treasures & ancient ruins
  • Befriend cute Corgis
  • Send them out treasure hunting!
  • Sell treasure to buy better gear and EVEN MORE Corgis
  • REMEMBER TO STAY HYDRATED! Otherwise you will pass out and lose all your treasure

############

Controls
[WASD / STICKS] directions
[SPACE / A] jump
[LEFT MOUSE / X] interact
[E / Y] send corgis scavenging
[Q / RT] call corgis back

############
